Key Match Events: Nitish Kumar Reddy scored 74 runs off 34 balls.
Taskin Ahmed took 2 wickets for 16 runs.
Varun Chakravarthy took 2 wickets for 19 runs.
Nitish Kumar Reddy took 2 wickets for 23 runs.
Hardik Pandya provided a finishing kick to India's innings.
India's spinners bowled nine overs for just 49 runs and took five wickets.
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh chose to bowl first to use the dew to their advantage.
India chose to bat first to test their bowlers in dew conditions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch started off tacky but improved for batting as the night progressed.
Bangladesh's spinners conceded 116 runs in eight overs.
India's fast bowlers bowled 12 overs for 102 runs.
Rinku Singh celebrated his third T20I fifty.
Bangladesh were asked to score their highest T20I total to stay alive in the series.
India used seven bowlers, each taking at least one wicket.
